page.title: 08Roads
page.content: Public roads connect very adequately with the{N,S}and{E}but the{R.Trent} soon blocks direct traffic to the{W.} Road widths and surfaces are generally adequate but care is needed when meeting large lorries,double deck buses and agricultural machinery.Apart from the{A159}crossing the{North West} corner of the block all roads are secondary.These are the results of a traffic count carried out by children from{Scotter School}.The survey was taken where{High Street}joins the A159.In{30 mins.}165 vehicles were counted on the A159.Of these 115 were cars,47 were lorries or vans and 2 were motor cycles.Only 1 tractor was seen and no buses.In the same time 71 vehicles were counted on High Street. These were 51 cars,10 lorries and vans 6 motor cycles,2 buses and 2 tractors. Survey time 2 pm to 2.30 pm.
